nodes.text: Rasmal Desilijic Bansek was a Hutt who was a member of the Desilijic kajidic. During ancient times, Ramsmal defeated eight Hutt clans to secure the rights to the planet Kor Desilijic within the Bootana Hutta region of Hutt Space. The planet subsequently became the throneworld of Desilijic. The Rasmal Valley Palace, an opulent palace on Kor Desilijic, was later named after Rasmal.
